schema.title: Next Serve

dev.description: Serve the application in the dev mode.

quiet.description: Hide error messages containing server information.

customServerTarget.description: Target which builds the custom server.

hostname.description: Hostname on which the application is served.

buildLibsFromSource.description: Read buildable libraries from source instead of building them separately.

keepAliveTimeout.description: Max milliseconds to wait before closing inactive connection.

turbo.description: Activate the incremental bundler for Next.js, which is implemented in Rust. Please note, this feature is exclusively available in development mode.
